name: Quadrix
overview: Quadrix is your perfect everyday "Finger Workout Game". Move QUADS around the board using the free cell. Try to get same color QUADS into winning shapes: * 4 QUADS forming a square * 6 QUADS in line (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) * 4 QUADS on board corners Try to achieve this quickly! If the time indicator reaches the end, some of your QUADS will get locked (you can't move them anymore). But don't worry! You can always form a winning shape with those QUADS and they will get unlocked. You are sometimes awarded BONUS QUADS: * Time Freeze (freeze time for 30 seconds) * Unlocker (unlocks QUADS colored like the current shape) * X5 Bonus (the score for the current shape is multiplied by 5) FEATURES * Colorful graphics * Fun sound effects * Optional voice effects * Background music * Saves game state This game is recommended for fans of puzzle games such as Trism or Bejewled. Try to build your own strategy! Good luck!
